name: Stockpile (itch) (verysoftwares)
description:
click on cards next to the pickaxe card to flip them around.

stack cards with face up, and leap over them with the pickaxe card. the score you get is the value of the top card x the size of the stack.

every 25th move there's an earthquake, resetting the board.

note that this is a prototype/feedback build, i want your ideas on how to make this more engaging!
